name: Mario Party Legacy 1 Vol. 1
summary:
Mario Party Legacy is a website for people to create custom boards for the Mario Party games released for the Nintendo 64.

This modpack is a selection of 4 of the custom boards for the first Mario Party, selected to be featured on RetroAchievements.

The first volume contains:

- Snowflake Lake by SuperZambezi
- Constellation Chaos by MikesMonsterGaming
- Rainbow Road by NintendoFan
- Minecraft Mayhem by Professor C-Dawg
